original_text: Now here is the king you have chosen, the one you asked for; see, the Lord has set a king over you.
korean_text: 이제 너희가 구한 왕, 너희가 택한 왕을 보라 여호와께서 너희 위에 왕을 세우셨느니라

sentences.original_text: Now here is the king you have chosen
sentences.korean_translation: 보라, 너희가 택한 왕이 여기 있다

sentences.original_text: the Lord has set a king over you
